practicum
Class UI

java.lang.Object
  practicum.UI
Direct Known Subclasses:
HumanUI, TorXUI
public abstract class UI
extends java.lang.Object

This abstract class implements general functionality of the user interface. It needs to receive a model to work with. Methods getMove() and reportResult() are abstract.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a user interface based on a model.
